comment: /**  * Returns {@code true} if a template is available for the given {@code view}.  * @param view the view name  * @param environment the environment  * @param classLoader the class loader  * @param resourceLoader the resource loader  * @return if the template is available  */
code: /**  * Returns {@code true} if a template is available for the given {@code view}.  * @param view the view name  * @param environment the environment  * @param classLoader the class loader  * @param resourceLoader the resource loader  * @return if the template is available  */ boolean isTemplateAvailable(String view, Environment environment, ClassLoader classLoader, ResourceLoader resourceLoader).
